column4: Ia m trying to use aptoncd but its not listing all the programs that are installed. I can add folders in which the other programs are but what is the C:\Program Files equivalent in linux?
the concept of the application all occupying a single directory doesn't exist in the unix world
APTonCD gives an option to add folders..thats aok
APTonCD gives an option to add folders..thats ok I will use remastersys
